text:
@BeachPretzel2 .
PHOENIX – The Arizona Department of Health Services reported 34,458 cases of COVID-19 and 1,183 deaths in the state, as of June 13. The Department said 456,915 tests for COVID-19 had been completed as of Saturday in public and private labs in Arizona

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

annotations.normalized_text: The Arizona Department of Health Services
